Accessibility Examples

Design Patterns

The following example implementations are inspired by the design patterns outlined in WAI-ARIA 1.0 Authoring Practices: Design Patterns. Not every design pattern in the guide is represented here - this is a work in progress.

  • Accordion
  • Alert
  • Alert Dialog
  • Auto Complete
  • Button
  • Dialog Modal
  • Menu
  • Tabpanel

Other Examples

The following examples attempt to solve common design problems in an accessible manner. These examples are not from the ARIA Authoring Practices guide.

  • Form Validation
